title: 每日靈修·每日與主同行 1.5.0
text:
每日靈修·每日與主同行 1.5.0
虎 李– Freeware – iOS
out of 125 votes
Make your spiritual journey more convenient and honest! Daily Devotion, daily walk with the Lord!
Daily Devotion includes everything you desire:
- Daily Manna: The sweetness of surrendering your life to the Holy Spirit, with encouragement, promises, warnings, etc. listed daily for year-round biblical reference.
- Streams in the Desert: A book that has guided people seeking an oasis in the desert of life for nearly a century.
- Words of Life: Each article contains thought-provoking stories that beautifully explain the essence of spiritual life, transforming faith into everyday living.
- Feast in the Wilderness: Provides countless individuals with spiritual strength amidst challenging circumstances.
- Living Water: Inspired by the rivers of living water given by the Lord. Just as water from a flowing river nourishes and irrigates, these daily readings rejuvenate, comfort, and empower believers, enabling them to be strong and courageous during trials and find joy in adversity. Leading saints to seek the riches found in Christ so they may flourish in life through truth—victorious over oneself, the world, and evil.
Main Features of Daily Devotion:
- Carefully selected devotional readings for a more convenient experience
- Supports customizable fonts
- Offers daily reminders
- Provides day/night mode
Overview
每日靈修·每日與主同行 is a Freeware software in the category Home & Hobby developed by
虎 李.
The latest version of 每日靈修·每日與主同行 is 1.5.0, released on 12/29/2023. It was initially added to our database on 12/29/2023.
每日靈修·每日與主同行 runs on the following operating systems: iOS.
Users of 每日靈修·每日與主同行 gave it a rating of 5 out of 5 stars.
